item.title: Skill Trio Progress
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok i just got done with the steel upgrading.[br][size=1]Posted on: January 11, 2007, 11:29:11 PM[/size][hr]ok so now i got full leather trimming (reg, green, blue), full black, full repair, and upgrade bronze, iron, and steel. all in 3 days doin 2 hours a day[br][size=1]Posted on: January 12, 2007, 12:33:14 AM[/size][hr]UPDATE: Black Upgrading
Black Trimming
Added Gilded Smithing[br][size=1]Posted on: January 20, 2007, 11:18:16 PM[/size][hr]UPDATE: added CFg files for repairing. i took a break from codeing. but now im back.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Trio Progress
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Well, here is an example

switch(someInt){
   case 43: System.out.println("43");
                break;
   case 543: throw new InternalError();
   case 8:  shutDownServer = true;
   // etc ...
   default: System.out.println("Nothing interesting happens.");

basically the general syntax is

switch(variable){
   case value: do something;
   case another value: do something else;
   default: do here what you do when nothing else matches;

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Trio Progress
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

trimming:

[code]
/////Armor Trimming/////
/////Leather Trimming/////
public void leatherChapsTrim()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 1)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Silver Needle”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1097, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need Some Leather Chaps”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1097, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1097, getItemSlot(1097), 1);
addItem(7368, 1);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[24]), 24);
sendMessage(“You Created Studded Leather Chaps (t)”);
}
}
}

public void leatherBodyTrim()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 5)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Silver Needle”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1133, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Leather Body”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1133, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1133, getItemSlot(1133), 1);
addItem(7364, 1);
addSkillXP((75*playerLevel[24]), 24);
sendMessage(“You Created A Studded Leather Body (t)”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 5)
{
sendMessage(“You need a Trimming level of 5 before you can make a Studded Leather Body (t)”);
}
}
}

{

[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: January 10, 2007, 09:46:13 PM[/size][hr]repairing:

/////Armor Repairing/////
/////Damaged Armor/////
public void repairArmor()
{
if(playerLevel[27] >= 75)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2347, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Hammer");
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need Some Damaged Armor");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2347, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(697, getItemSlot(697), 1);
addItem = Item2.randomarmorrepair();
addSkillXP((2500*playerLevel[27]), 27);
sendMessage("You repaired the armor and got");
}
}
}

public void repairArmorGold()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 30)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Gold Hammer");
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need Some Damaged Armor");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(697, getItemSlot(697), 1);
addItem = Item2.randomarmorrepairgold();
addSkillXP((5000*playerLevel[27]), 27);
sendMessage("You repaired the armor and got");
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 99)
{
sendMessage("You need a Repairing level of 99 Before you can repair armor with a Gold Hammer");
}
}
}

/////End of Damaged Armor/////

/////Damaged Weapons/////

public void repairWeapon()
{
if(playerLevel[27] >= 1)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2347, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Hammer");
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(686, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Damaged Weapon");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2347, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(697, getItemSlot(697), 1);
addItem = Item2.randomweaponrepair();
addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[27]), 27);
sendMessage("You repaired the weapon and got");
}
}
}

public void repairWeaponGold()
{
if(playerLevel[24] >= 30)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Gold Hammer");
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(686, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage("You Need A Damaged Weapon");
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(1804, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(697, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(697, getItemSlot(697), 1);
addItem = Item2.randomweaponrepairgold();
addSkillXP((750*playerLevel[27]), 27);
sendMessage("You repaired the weapon and got");
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 30)
{
sendMessage("You need a Repairing level of 30 before you can repair weapons with a Gold Hammer");
}
}
}

so that’s all i got so far. i hope these skills turn out to be good.

Read full topic

item.title: Skill Trio Progress
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

ok so im makin 3 skills without any online tutorials. so far i have about 1/8 of upgrading, 2/7 of trimming, and 100 percent repairing. so read my post and tell me if this is a good rate of progress for only 2 days of work.

upgrading [code]

/////Upgrading/////
/////Bronze/////
/////Weapons/////
/////Blades/////

public void bronzeDagger()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 10)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1205, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Dagger”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1205, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1205, getItemSlot(1205), 1);
addItem(1277, 1);
addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Dagger into a Bronze Sword”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 10)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 10 before you can Upgrade Bronze Daggers to Bronze Swords”);
}
}
}

public void bronzeSwords()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 15)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1277, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Sword”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1277, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1291, getItemSlot(1291), 1);
addItem(1191, 1);
addSkillXP((200*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Sword into a Bronze Long Sword”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 15)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 15 before you can Upgrade Bronze Swords to Bronze Long Swords”);
}
}
}

public void bronzelongSword()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 20)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1191, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Long Sword”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1191, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1191, getItemSlot(1191), 1);
addItem(1321, 1);
addSkillXP((250*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Long Sword into a Bronze Scimitar”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 20)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 20 before you can Upgrade Bronze Long Swords to Bronze Scimitars”);
}
}
}

public void bronze2Hand()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 25)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1321, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Scimitar”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1321, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1321, getItemSlot(1321), 1);
addItem(1307, 1);
addSkillXP((300*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Scimitar into a Bronze 2 Handed Sword”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 25)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 25 before you can Upgrade Bronze Scimitars to Bronze 2 Handed Swords”);
}
}
}

/////End Blades/////

/////Axes/////

public void bronzeHatchet()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 30)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1351, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Hatchet”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1351, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1351, getItemSlot(1351), 1);
addItem(1375, 1);
addSkillXP((350*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Hatchet into a Bronze Battle Axe”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 30)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 30 before you can Upgrade Bronze Hatchets to Bronze Battle Axes”);
}
}
}

public void bronzeBattleAxe()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 35)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1375, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Battle Axe”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1375, 1) == true))
{

addItem(3190, 1);
addSkillXP((400*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Battle Axe into a Bronze Halberd”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 35)

/////End of Axes/////
/////End of Weapons/////

/////Armor/////

public void bronzeMedHelm()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 1)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{

if(playerHasItemAmount(1139, 1) == false)

else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1139, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1139, getItemSlot(1139), 1);
addItem(1155, 1);
addSkillXP((50*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Med Helm into a Bronze Full Helm”);
}
}
}

public void bronzeSquareShields()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 5)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1173, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Square Shield”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1173, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1173, getItemSlot(1173), 1);
addItem(1189, 1);
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Square Shield into a Bronze Kite Shield”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 5)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 5 before you can Upgrade Bronze Square Shields to Bronze Kite Sheilds”);
}
}
}

public void bronzeChainBody()
{
if(playerLevel[29] >= 15)
{
if(playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Gold Hammer”);
}
if(playerHasItemAmount(1103, 1) == false)
{
sendMessage(“You Need A Bronze Chain body”);
}
else if((playerHasItemAmount(2949, 1) == true) && (playerHasItemAmount(1103, 1) == true))
{
deleteItem(1103, getItemSlot(1103), 1);
addItem(1117, 1);
addSkillXP((100*playerLevel[29]), 29);
sendMessage(“You Upgraded your Bronze Chain body into a Bronze Plate Body”);
}
else if(playerLevel[24] < 15)
{
sendMessage(“You need an Upgrading level of 15 before you can Upgrade Bronze Chain Bodies to Bronze Plate Bodies”);
}
}
}
